text.more:
This network was modeled around anime credits data taken from the AnimeNewsNetwork Encyclopedia.

Included are profiles such as original creators, producers, directors, script writers, key animators, filming and sound positions, ... The visualization does not include voice actors nor staff associated with overseas companies.

Tools: Python 2.7, NetworkX, Gephi.

Contact author at mjenko t-2 net
